title: 81/34/EEC: Commission Decision of 16 January 1981 amending Decision 78/737/EEC on the sale of butter to certain classes of consumer receiving social assistance
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 16 January 1981 amending Decision 78/737/EEC on the sale of butter to certain classes of consumer receiving social assistance (81/34/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: With effect from 1 January 1980, "12 months" in the last subparagraph of Article 1 (3) of Decision 78/737/EEC is hereby replaced by "18 months".
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 16 January 1981.
For the Commission
The President
Gaston THORN  (1) OJ No L 148, 28.6.1968, p. 13. (2) OJ No L 245, 7.9.1978, p. 31.
